tool_description: TranslaText is a versatile translation app designed to bridge language barriers and make communication effortless. Whether you're traveling, working, or simply trying to understand text in a different language, TranslaText has you covered. Here are some key features:
name: TranslaText
title: TranslaText

api_list.name: postTranslate
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://translatext.p.rapidapi.com/api/translate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translatext.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://translatext.p.rapidapi.com/api/translate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translatext.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
